name: Pager
author: Arron Schaar
description: Tired of creating pagers clientside and server side?  Set a few properties on this tag and it will do the rest.

attributes.page-padding: Sets the number of pages to show on the sides of the selected page.
attributes.firstlast: Displays the first and last links
attributes.prevnext: Displays the previous and next links

events.pagechanged: Fired when user clicks on a different page number or previous/next/first/last.

setters.current-page: Sets the attribute, refreshes the pager and fires pagechanged event.
